name: OPH_IPROC_INFO_VALUE
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Imaging and Procedures Value (I ORD 81052) item.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: IPROC_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the data values for a response to an imaging or procedure result form question.
